class.name: TextServerExtension
class.brief_description: Base class for TextServer custom implementations (plugins).
class.description: External TextServer implementations should inherit from this class.

method.name: _create_font
method.description: Creates new, empty font cache entry resource. To free the resulting resourec, use [method _free] method.

method.name: _create_shaped_text
method.description: Creates new buffer for complex text layout, with the given [code]direction[/code] and [code]orientation[/code]. To free the resulting buffer, use [method _free] method. [b]Note:[/b] Direction is ignored if server does not support [code]FEATURE_BIDI_LAYOUT[/code] feature. [b]Note:[/b] Orientation is ignored if server does not support [code]FEATURE_VERTICAL_LAYOUT[/code] feature.

method.name: _draw_hex_code_box
method.description: Draws box displaying character hexadecimal code. Used for replacing missing characters.

method.name: _font_clear_glyphs
method.description: Removes all rendered glyphs information from the cache entry. [b]Note:[/b] This function will not remove textures associated with the glyphs, use [method _font_remove_texture] to remove them manually.

method.name: _font_clear_kerning_map
method.description: Removes all kerning overrides.

method.name: _font_clear_size_cache
method.description: Removes all font sizes from the cache entry

method.name: _font_clear_textures
method.description: Removes all textures from font cache entry. [b]Note:[/b] This function will not remove glyphs associated with the texture, use [method _font_remove_glyph] to remove them manually.

method.name: _font_draw_glyph
method.description: Draws single glyph into a canvas item at the position, using [code]font_rid[/code] at the size [code]size[/code]. [b]Note:[/b] Glyph index is specific to the font, use glyphs indices returned by [method _shaped_text_get_glyphs] or [method _font_get_glyph_index].

method.name: _font_draw_glyph_outline
method.description: Draws single glyph outline of size [code]outline_size[/code] into a canvas item at the position, using [code]font_rid[/code] at the size [code]size[/code]. [b]Note:[/b] Glyph index is specific to the font, use glyphs indices returned by [method _shaped_text_get_glyphs] or [method _font_get_glyph_index].

method.name: _font_get_ascent
method.description: Returns the font ascent (number of pixels above the baseline).

method.name: _font_get_descent
method.description: Returns the font descent (number of pixels below the baseline).

method.name: _font_get_fixed_size
method.description: Returns bitmap font fixed size.

method.name: _font_get_global_oversampling
method.description: Returns the font oversampling factor, shared by all fonts in the TextServer.

method.name: _font_get_glyph_advance
method.description: Returns glyph advance (offset of the next glyph). [b]Note:[/b] Advance for glyphs outlines is the same as the base glyph advance and is not saved.

method.name: _font_get_glyph_contours
method.description: Returns outline contours of the glyph as a [code]Dictionary[/code] with the following contents: [code]points[/code] - [PackedVector3Array], containing outline points. [code]x[/code] and [code]y[/code] are point coordinates. [code]z[/code] is the type of the point, using the [enum TextServer.ContourPointTag] values. [code]contours[/code] - [PackedInt32Array], containing indices the end points of each contour. [code]orientation[/code] - [bool], contour orientation. If [code]true[/code], clockwise contours must be filled.

method.name: _font_get_glyph_index
method.description: Returns the glyph index of a [code]char[/code], optionally modified by the [code]variation_selector[/code].

method.name: _font_get_glyph_list
method.description: Returns list of rendered glyphs in the cache entry.

method.name: _font_get_glyph_offset
method.description: Returns glyph offset from the baseline.

method.name: _font_get_glyph_size
method.description: Returns size of the glyph.

method.name: _font_get_glyph_texture_idx
method.description: Returns index of the cache texture containing the glyph.

method.name: _font_get_glyph_uv_rect
method.description: Returns rectangle in the cache texture containing the glyph.

method.name: _font_get_hinting
method.description: Returns the font hinting mode. Used by dynamic fonts only.

method.name: _font_get_kerning
method.description: Returns kerning for the pair of glyphs.

method.name: _font_get_kerning_list
method.description: Returns list of the kerning overrides.

method.name: _font_get_language_support_override
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if support override is enabled for the [code]language[/code].

method.name: _font_get_language_support_overrides
method.description: Returns list of language support overrides.

method.name: _font_get_msdf_pixel_range
method.description: Return the width of the range around the shape between the minimum and maximum representable signed distance.

method.name: _font_get_msdf_size
method.description: Returns source font size used to generate MSDF textures.

method.name: _font_get_name
method.description: Returns font family name.

method.name: _font_get_oversampling
method.description: Returns font oversampling factor, if set to [code]0.0[/code] global oversampling factor is used instead. Used by dynamic fonts only.

method.name: _font_get_scale
method.description: Returns scaling factor of the color bitmap font.

method.name: _font_get_script_support_override
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if support override is enabled for the [code]script[/code].

method.name: _font_get_script_support_overrides
method.description: Returns list of script support overrides.

method.name: _font_get_size_cache_list
method.description: Return list of the font sizes in the cache. Each size is [code]Vector2i[/code] with font size and outline size.

method.name: _font_get_spacing
method.description: Returns extra spacing added between glyphs in pixels.

method.name: _font_get_style
method.description: Returns font style flags, see [enum TextServer.FontStyle].

method.name: _font_get_style_name
method.description: Returns font style name.

method.name: _font_get_supported_chars
method.description: Returns a string containing all the characters available in the font.

method.name: _font_get_texture_count
method.description: Returns number of textures used by font cache entry.

method.name: _font_get_texture_image
method.description: Returns font cache texture image data.

method.name: _font_get_texture_offsets
method.description: Returns array containing the first free pixel in the each column of texture. Should be the same size as texture width or empty.

method.name: _font_get_underline_position
method.description: Returns pixel offset of the underline below the baseline.

method.name: _font_get_underline_thickness
method.description: Returns thickness of the underline in pixels.

method.name: _font_get_variation_coordinates
method.description: Returns variation coordinates for the specified font cache entry. See [method _font_supported_variation_list] for more info.

method.name: _font_has_char
method.description: Return [code]true[/code] if a Unicode [code]char[/code] is available in the font.

method.name: _font_is_antialiased
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if font 8-bit anitialiased glyph rendering is supported and enabled.

method.name: _font_is_force_autohinter
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if auto-hinting is supported and preffered over font built-in hinting. Used by dynamic fonts only.

method.name: _font_is_language_supported
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code], if font supports given language ([url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_639-1]ISO 639[/url] code).

method.name: _font_is_multichannel_signed_distance_field
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if glyphs of all sizes are rendered using single multichannel signed distance field generated from the dynamic font vector data.

method.name: _font_is_script_supported
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code], if font supports given script (ISO 15924 code).

method.name: _font_remove_glyph
method.description: Removes specified rendered glyph information from the cache entry. [b]Note:[/b] This function will not remove textures associated with the glyphs, use [method _font_remove_texture] to remove them manually.

method.name: _font_remove_kerning
method.description: Removes kerning override for the pair of glyphs.

method.name: _font_remove_language_support_override
method.description: Remove language support override.

method.name: _font_remove_script_support_override
method.description: Removes script support override.

method.name: _font_remove_size_cache
method.description: Removes specified font size from the cache entry.

method.name: _font_remove_texture
method.description: Removes specified texture from font cache entry. [b]Note:[/b] This function will not remove glyphs associated with the texture, remove them manually, using [method _font_remove_glyph].

method.name: _font_render_glyph
method.description: Renders specified glyph the the font cache texture.

method.name: _font_render_range
method.description: Renders the range of characters to the font cache texture.

method.name: _font_set_antialiased
method.description: If set to [code]true[/code], 8-bit antialiased glyph rendering is used, otherwise 1-bit rendering is used. Used by dynamic fonts only.

method.name: _font_set_ascent
method.description: Sets the font ascent (number of pixels above the baseline).

method.name: _font_set_data
method.description: Sets font source data, e.g contents of the dynamic font source file.

method.name: _font_set_data_ptr
method.description: Sets the font descent (number of pixels below the baseline).

method.name: _font_set_descent
method.description: Sets bitmap font fixed size. If set to value greater than zero, same cache entry will be used for all font sizes.

method.name: _font_set_fixed_size
method.description: If set to [code]true[/code] auto-hinting is preffered over font built-in hinting.

method.name: _font_set_global_oversampling
method.description: Sets oversampling factor, shared by all font in the TextServer. [b]Note:[/b] This value can be automaticaly changed by display server.

method.name: _font_set_glyph_advance
method.description: Sets glyph advance (offset of the next glyph). [b]Note:[/b] Advance for glyphs outlines is the same as the base glyph advance and is not saved.

method.name: _font_set_glyph_offset
method.description: Sets glyph offset from the baseline.

method.name: _font_set_glyph_size
method.description: Sets size of the glyph.

method.name: _font_set_glyph_texture_idx
method.description: Sets index of the cache texture containing the glyph.

method.name: _font_set_glyph_uv_rect
method.description: Sets rectangle in the cache texture containing the glyph.

method.name: _font_set_hinting
method.description: Sets font hinting mode. Used by dynamic fonts only.

method.name: _font_set_kerning
method.description: Sets kerning for the pair of glyphs.

method.name: _font_set_language_support_override
method.description: Adds override for [method _font_is_language_supported].

method.name: _font_set_msdf_pixel_range
method.description: Sets the width of the range around the shape between the minimum and maximum representable signed distance.

method.name: _font_set_msdf_size
method.description: Sets source font size used to generate MSDF textures.

method.name: _font_set_multichannel_signed_distance_field
method.description: If set to [code]true[/code], glyphs of all sizes are rendered using single multichannel signed distance field generated from the dynamic font vector data.

method.name: _font_set_name
method.description: Sets the font family name.

method.name: _font_set_oversampling
method.description: Sets font oversampling factor, if set to [code]0.0[/code] global oversampling factor is used instead. Used by dynamic fonts only.

method.name: _font_set_scale
method.description: Sets scaling factor of the color bitmap font.

method.name: _font_set_script_support_override
method.description: Adds override for [method _font_is_script_supported].

method.name: _font_set_spacing
method.description: Sets extra spacing added between glyphs in pixels.

method.name: _font_set_style
method.description: Sets the font style flags, see [enum TextServer.FontStyle].

method.name: _font_set_style_name
method.description: Sets the font style name.

method.name: _font_set_texture_image
method.description: Sets font cache texture image data.

method.name: _font_set_texture_offsets
method.description: Sets array containing the first free pixel in the each column of texture. Should be the same size as texture width or empty.

method.name: _font_set_underline_position
method.description: Sets pixel offset of the underline below the baseline.

method.name: _font_set_underline_thickness
method.description: Sets thickness of the underline in pixels.

method.name: _font_set_variation_coordinates
method.description: Sets variation coordinates for the specified font cache entry. See [method _font_supported_variation_list] for more info.

method.name: _font_supported_feature_list
method.description: Returns the dictionary of the supported OpenType features.

method.name: _font_supported_variation_list
method.description: Returns the dictionary of the supported OpenType variation coordinates.

method.name: _format_number
method.description: Converts a number from the Western Arabic (0..9) to the numeral systems used in [code]language[/code].

method.name: _free
method.description: Frees an object created by this [TextServer].

method.name: _get_features
method.description: Returns text server features, see [enum TextServer.Feature].

method.name: _get_hex_code_box_size
method.description: Returns size of the replacement character (box with character hexadecimal code that is drawn in place of invalid characters).

method.name: _get_name
method.description: Returns the name of the server interface.

method.name: _get_support_data_filename
method.description: Returns default TextServer database (e.g. ICU break iterators and dictionaries) filename.

method.name: _get_support_data_info
method.description: Returns TextServer database (e.g. ICU break iterators and dictionaries) description.

method.name: _has
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if [code]rid[/code] is valid resource owned by this text server.

method.name: _has_feature
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the server supports a feature.

method.name: _is_locale_right_to_left
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if locale is right-to-left.

method.name: _load_support_data
method.description: Loads optional TextServer database (e.g. ICU break iterators and dictionaries). [b]Note:[/b] This function should be called before any other TextServer functions used, otherwise it won't have any effect.

method.name: _name_to_tag
method.description: Converts readable feature, variation, script or language name to OpenType tag.

method.name: _parse_number
method.description: Converts a number from the numeral systems used in [code]language[/code] to Western Arabic (0..9).

method.name: _percent_sign
method.description: Returns percent sign used in the [code]language[/code].

method.name: _save_support_data
method.description: Saves optional TextServer database (e.g. ICU break iterators and dictionaries) to the file. [b]Note:[/b] This function is used by during project export, to include TextServer database.

method.name: _shaped_text_add_object
method.description: Adds inline object to the text buffer, [code]key[/code] must be unique. In the text, object is represented as [code]length[/code] object replacement characters.

method.name: _shaped_text_add_string
method.description: Adds text span and font to draw it to the text buffer.

method.name: _shaped_text_clear
method.description: Clears text buffer (removes text and inline objects).

method.name: _shaped_text_draw
method.description: Draw shaped text into a canvas item at a given position, with [code]color[/code]. [code]pos[/code] specifies the leftmost point of the baseline (for horizontal layout) or topmost point of the baseline (for vertical layout).

method.name: _shaped_text_draw_outline
method.description: Draw the outline of the shaped text into a canvas item at a given position, with [code]color[/code]. [code]pos[/code] specifies the leftmost point of the baseline (for horizontal layout) or topmost point of the baseline (for vertical layout).

method.name: _shaped_text_fit_to_width
method.description: Adjusts text with to fit to specified width, returns new text width

method.name: _shaped_text_get_ascent
method.description: Returns the text ascent (number of pixels above the baseline for horizontal layout or to the left of baseline for vertical). [b]Note:[/b] Overall ascent can be higher than font ascent, if some glyphs are displaced from the baseline.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_carets
method.description: Returns shapes of the carets corresponding to the character offset [code]position[/code] in the text. Returned caret shape is 1 pixel wide rectangle.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_custom_punctuation
method.description: Returns custom punctuation character list, used for word breaking. If set to empty string, server defaults are used.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_descent
method.description: Returns the text descent (number of pixels below the baseline for horizontal layout or to the right of baseline for vertical). [b]Note:[/b] Overall descent can be higher than font descent, if some glyphs are displaced from the baseline.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_direction
method.description: Returns direction of the text.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_dominant_direction_in_range
method.description: Returns dominant direction of in the range of text.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_ellipsis_glyph_count
method.description: Returns number of glyphs in the ellipsis.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_ellipsis_glyphs
method.description: Returns array of the glyphs in the ellipsis.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_ellipsis_pos
method.description: Returns position of the ellipsis.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_glyph_count
method.description: Returns text glyphs count.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_glyphs
method.description: Copies text glyphs in the visual order, into preallocated array of the size returned by [method _shaped_text_get_glyph_count].

method.name: _shaped_text_get_grapheme_bounds
method.description: Returns composite character's bounds as offsets from the start of the line.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_line_breaks
method.description: Breaks text to the lines and returns character ranges for each line.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_line_breaks_adv
method.description: Breaks text to the lines and columns. Returns character ranges for each segment.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_object_rect
method.description: Returns bounding rectangle of the inline object.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_objects
method.description: Returns array of inline objects.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_orientation
method.description: Returns text orientation.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_parent
method.description: Sets text orientation.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_preserve_control
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if text buffer is configured to display control characters.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_preserve_invalid
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if text buffer is configured to display hexadecimal codes in place of invalid characters. [b]Note:[/b] If set to [code]false[/code], nothing is displayed in place of invalid characters.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_range
method.description: Returns substring buffer character range in the parent buffer.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_selection
method.description: Returns selection rectangles for the specified character range.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_size
method.description: Returns size of the text.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_trim_pos
method.description: Returns ellipsis and trim positions.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_underline_position
method.description: Returns pixel offset of the underline below the baseline.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_underline_thickness
method.description: Returns thickness of the underline.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_width
method.description: Returns width (for horizontal layout) or height (for vertical) of the text.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_word_breaks
method.description: Breaks text into words and returns array of character ranges.

method.name: _shaped_text_hit_test_grapheme
method.description: Returns grapheme index at the specified pixel offset at the baseline, or [code]-1[/code] if none is found.

method.name: _shaped_text_hit_test_position
method.description: Returns caret character offset at the specified pixel offset at the baseline. This function always returns a valid position.

method.name: _shaped_text_is_ready
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if buffer is successfully shaped.

method.name: _shaped_text_next_grapheme_pos
method.description: Returns composite character end position closest to the [code]pos[/code].

method.name: _shaped_text_overrun_trim_to_width
method.description: Trims text if it exceeds the given width.

method.name: _shaped_text_prev_grapheme_pos
method.description: Returns composite character start position closest to the [code]pos[/code].

method.name: _shaped_text_resize_object
method.description: Sets new size and alignment of embedded object.

method.name: _shaped_text_set_bidi_override
method.description: Overrides BiDi for the structured text. Override ranges should cover full source text without overlaps. BiDi algorithm will be used on each range separately.

method.name: _shaped_text_set_custom_punctuation
method.description: Sets custom punctuation character list, used for word breaking. If set to empty string, server defaults are used.

method.name: _shaped_text_set_direction
method.description: Sets desired text direction. If set to [code]TEXT_DIRECTION_AUTO[/code], direction will be detected based on the buffer contents and current locale. [b]Note:[/b] Direction is ignored if server does not support [code]FEATURE_BIDI_LAYOUT[/code] feature.

method.name: _shaped_text_set_orientation
method.description: Sets desired text orientation. [b]Note:[/b] Orientation is ignored if server does not support [code]FEATURE_VERTICAL_LAYOUT[/code] feature.

method.name: _shaped_text_set_preserve_control
method.description: If set to [code]true[/code] text buffer will display control characters.

method.name: _shaped_text_set_preserve_invalid
method.description: If set to [code]true[/code] text buffer will display invalid characters as hexadecimal codes, otherwise nothing is displayed.

method.name: _shaped_text_shape
method.description: Shapes buffer if it's not shaped. Returns [code]true[/code] if the string is shaped successfully. [b]Note:[/b] It is not necessary to call this function manually, buffer will be shaped automatically as soon as any of its output data is requested.

method.name: _shaped_text_sort_logical
method.description: Copies text glyphs in the logical order, into preallocated array of the size returned by [method _shaped_text_get_glyph_count].

method.name: _shaped_text_substr
method.description: Returns text buffer for the substring of the text in the [code]shaped[/code] text buffer (including inline objects).

method.name: _shaped_text_tab_align
method.description: Aligns shaped text to the given tab-stops.

method.name: _shaped_text_update_breaks
method.description: Updates line and word breaks.

method.name: _shaped_text_update_justification_ops
method.description: Updates justification opportunities (spaces, kashidas, etc.).

method.name: _tag_to_name
method.description: Converts OpenType tag to readable feature, variation, script or language name.
